fehd.ADR_EN: ROOM 1601, 16/F., BARTLOCK CENTRE, NO. 3 YIU WA STREET, CAUSEWAY BAY, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港銅鑼灣耀華街3號百樂中心16字樓1601室

geocode_en.formatted_address: Unit 1601, 16/F, Bartlock Centre, 3-9 Yiu Wa Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: Unit 1601, 16/F, Bartlock Centre, 3-9 Yiu Wa Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: Unit 1601, 16/F, Bartlock Centre, 3-9 Yiu Wa Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Sake no Wa

reviews.text: Great oden, superb service, and good selection of sake and shochu. The employees are great, and know their products very well.  They also operate as a wholesaler and can sell you bottles from their stock. Worth a visit for any sake or shochu lover in Hong Kong.

They have lots of sake from small breweries, which i like. The host introduced clearly what sake we could try and what the story is behind each of them. You can definitely taste the sake is a bit rough around the edges compared to bigger brands, but they are delicious nevertheless. Between 4 and 6, they have 30% off and you can bring your own food for pairing. The place is very small but clean and cozy. Definitely coming back for another drink.
Cosy 20 plus seats bar that doubles up as a sake retail / wholesale outlet, specialise in rare sake and fruit wines.  Attentive and informative service with a smile.  Can be busy some evenings.

Nice staff, many sake and good selections.
Good sake bar!

想不到這家小小居酒屋，清酒選擇非常多，食物亦很美味，值得再來！This sake bar which is so cosy and I do have a great time with good sake and good food. They have variety choice of sake. Worth to come and enjoy a pleasant night. The owner is Japanese which will be more authentic.

result.vicinity: Unit 1601, 16/F, Bartlock Centre, 3-9 Yiu Wa Street, Causeway Bay

result.adr_address: 號 1601 室, Bartlock Centre, 3 Yiu Wa St, Bowrington, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 號 1601 室, Bartlock Centre, 3 Yiu Wa St, Bowrington, Hong Kong
result.name: 酒の和

reviews.text:
Great experience !! Fair value with tasty snacks,
Small but cosy restaurant with super helpful and friendly staff 

Strongly recommend for those we love sake and need a place to talk !

想不到這家小小 Sake bar , 清酒選擇非常多，食物亦很美味。值得再來。This sake bar which is so cosy and I do have a great time with good wine and good food. You so can have variety choice of Sake in this place. Worth to come and enjoy a pleasant night. The owner is Japanese and sure is more authentic.

組織了一晚朋友清酒聚會，地方很漂亮，小小空間裝修得很用心。

清酒介紹到位，酒也很好。
人家是sake bar,而唔係居酒屋。就係因為呢Ｄ人（同Ｄ唔識嘢的强国人）要人哋改變。首先問下自己先啦！有冇尊重過人。
好多好多日本酒選擇，但伴酒菜比較少
